name: unconveyerble
description:
hello is yuri it's me! not an alien no im yuri

anyways this is my first game jam game! woohoo! I made it in Godot in like 8 hours so it's not that good...(also i used paint3D so i dont even know if its even following the rules... yeah)

anyways I hope you like it!

*CONTROLS*

left/right arrows/a/d to move

up arrows/w/space to jump/go through the door
